title: Blood Moon Zilean darkens the sun

replies.body: So uhh, why is Blood Moon {{champion:131}} not a thing? {{item:3151}}
Because Akali already is. It's a pity they didn't take the more obvious choice, but oh well.

"...a demon god awakens."

Riot comes up with some of the best lines.

"If I could turn back time
If I could find a way I'd take back those words that hurt you and you'd stay". That's all I got when I saw this.
